meanings.definition: The quality or state of being balmy.
meanings.sent1: The balminess of the air made me feel relaxed and calm.
meanings.sent2: I love the balminess of summer evenings, it's so peaceful.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was ruined by the unexpected balminess of the mayonnaise.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a balminess that soothed even the most troubled souls.
meanings.sent5: The balminess of the ocean breeze carried the scent of salt and flowers.

meanings.definition: The pleasantness or soothing nature of a warm, mild climate.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed the balminess of the tropical island, it was like paradise.
meanings.sent2: The balminess of the sun on my skin felt like a gentle hug.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched out in the balminess of the sunbeam, purring contentedly.
meanings.sent4: His smile radiated a balminess that warmed everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The balminess of the hot chocolate on a cold day was pure comfort.
